introduction:
Welcome to the Digital Logic Design Lab. Here you can make basic combinational and sequential digital circuits of your choice and simulate them.

Please note:
This lab requires few Software Dependencies to run the Simulations
i. Adobe Flash Plugin, Java1.7, Java3D 1.5.2 (The Java 3D API enables the creation of three-dimensional graphics applications and Internet-based 3D applets)
ii. Browsers Firefox 50 and it's below versions, internet explorer
iii. IcedTea Plugin for Linux Operating System

We recommend the following for the smooth running of these simulations
i. Install Adobe Flash Plugin - This will enable you to run the experiments that need Flash support. Please follow the link to install the Flash Plugin.
22. Install VirtualBox - Virtual Labs offers a free download of a customized VirtualBox with the required pre installed all the software dependencies(Java 1.7, Java3D-1.5.2, IcedTea Plugin and Adobe Flash Plugin). Please follow the link to download, install and use VirtualBox for Virtual Labs.

UG: B. Tech./ B.E in Computer Science, Electronics & Information Technology

objective: The digital logic design is a system that uses simple numerical values to produce input and output operations.

universities: Universities with Computer Science, Electronics & Information Technology
